raw_body: DR. WEERASEKARA J.K.S. – Dr. Susiri (Retired Consultant Orthopaedic Surgeon),​ husband of Dr. Keerthilatha Hettiarachchi (nee Karunasekara),​ father & father-in-law of Asha & Anura Mayadunne,​ Nayana & Rajeev Samarasinghe,​ Kalum & Suranga Jayabandu,​ brother & brother-in-law of late Drs. Malini & W.A.S. De Silva,​ late Padma & Lakshman De Silva,​ Lakshmi and late Dileepa Munasinghe,​ Jagath & Chandrika Weerasekara,​ loving grandfather of Dinali,​ Vinuki,​ Dillon,​ Tanuri & Tevin passed away on 7th August 2023. Cremation on Wednesday 9th August 2023 at 4.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery (Devi Balika side). No. 84,​ Dewala Road,​ Nugegoda.049183
